name: Run Lifeless
description:
Game created for the GJF episode 9, the theme was: LODE RUNNER.

Music & Sound  by Kayupla : https://kayupla.bandcamp.com/

happy to have participated in this jam, and to have realized this little game. There is not much time of play but I hope that you will like it.

Controls:

Keyboard:
Move : ZQSD
Destroy Blocks : E

joystick :
Move : Left Stick
Destroy blocks: B  Button
